concept.title: Enagement Features
concept.shortdesc: Engage your site visitors with features that keep them coming back to your site when they discover your content.

section.title: Custom Buttons
section.p: Custom action buttons, and the associated action, can be added to any user or piece of content in any Livefyre App, alongside the existing Flag, Share, Delete buttons. Examples could be enabling a user to hide content from another user, or to follow a user.
For technical information on adding custom action buttons, please see Adding Custom Buttons.

section.title: Like
section.p: Add the ability to "like" a comment or reply.

section.title: Media Expansion
section.p: The ability to view a piece of media in a larger modal window.

section.title: Friend Mentions
section.p: @mention a user, or someone who has already posted content into the Collection.

To mention someone who has posted content into the Collection, users may click the @ mention button, or type @ into the editor to display a list of people available for mention. The list will include all users who are following the conversation. (Start typing a name to limit the list to matches for the input text.)
section.note: Users who are @replied do not receive notification of the post.
section.p: The friend tagging function is not available on mobile, and is not available on IE8 or earlier.

section.title: Action Buttons
section.p: Create custom action buttons for content in an App.

Custom action buttons, and the associated action, can be added to any user or piece of content in any Livefyre App, alongside the existing Flag, Share, Delete buttons. Examples could be enabling a user to hide content from another user, or to follow a user.

section.title: Follow Conversation
section.p: Allows users to receive email notifications when conversations they follow are changed.

Following a conversation allows users to receive email notifications, based on activity in the conversation. Users click the Follow / Unfollow button to set conversation-specific preferences, or use their Profile Settings page to set a site-wide preference to follow conversations.
(The Follow function is not available on mobile.)
section.note: Emails will only be sent for manually posted content, not for content pulled into the stream through SocialSync or Curate.
